metadata.synopsis: Character is under inspection after arriving to HAV from MOO. They need to be checked for a tadpole.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Click on this character as they're being inspected

0.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
0.text: This is ridiculous - as if I'd let some parasite infect me.
0.context: NodeContext: Loathing in his voice at the thought
